articles.description: Record spending on manufacturing construction heralds a made-in-the-U.S. rebound, stoked by green-energy incentives and concerns about foreign supply chains; ‘this is here to stay’

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Over 100K Canadians without power after brutal ice storm - Fox News
articles.description: Hundreds of thousands of Canadians were left without power in parts of Quebec and Ontario after the Great White North's eastern half was hit with a major ice storm.
articles.content: Hundreds of thousands of people remained without power Friday in eastern Canada two days after a storm left parts of Quebec and Ontario coated in ice, causing tree limbs to break and fall on power li… [+1320 chars]
